Verses: 1 isravelil Raajaa Illaadha Annaatkalile, Eppiraayeem Malaigal Aruge Paradhesiyaaith Thangina Oru Leviyan Irundhaan; Avan Yoodhaavilulla Pedhlegem Ooraalaagiya Oru Sthreeyaith Thanakku Marumanaiyaattiyaagak Kondirundhaan.
2 aval Avanukkuth Dhrogamaai Vibasaarampanni, Avanai Vittu, Yoodhaa Dhesaththup Pedhlegem Oorilirukkira Than Thagappan Veettukkup Poi, Ange Naalumaadham Varaikkum Irundhaal.

3 aval Purushan Avalode Nalavu Sollavum, Avalaith Thirumba Azhaiththu Varavum, Irandu Kazhudhaigalai Aayaththappaduththi, Than Velaikkaaranaik Koottik Kondu, Avalidaththukkup Ponaan; Appozhudhu Aval Avanaith Than Thagappan Veettukku Azhaiththukkondu Ponaal; Sthreeyin Thagappan Avanaik Kandapodhu Sandhoshamaai Etrukkondu,
4 sthreeyin Thagappanaagiya Avanudaiya Maaman Avanai Iruththikkondadhinaal, Moondrunaal Avanodirundhaan; Avargal Ange Pusiththuk Kudiththu Raaththanginaargal.

5 naalaamnaal Kaalame Avargal Ezhundhirundhapodhu, Avan Prayaanappadugaiyil, Sthreeyin Thagappan Than Marumaganai Nokki: Konjam Appam Pusiththu, Un Manadhaith Thetrikkol, Pirpaadu Neengal Pogalaam Endraan.
6 avargal Utkaarndhu, Iruvarumkoodap Pusiththuk Kudiththaargal; Sthreeyin Thagappan Andha Manushanaip Paarththu: Nee Dhayavuseydhu, Un Irudhayam Magizhchchiyadaiya Raaththirikkum Iru Endraan.
7 appadiye Pogiradharku Andha Manushan Ezhundhapodhu, Avanudaiya Maaman Avanai Varundhikkondadhinaal, Avan Andru Raaththiriyum Ange Irundhaan.

8 aindhaam Naalile Avan Pogiradharku Adhikaalame Ezhundhirundhapodhu, Sthreeyin Thagappan: Irundhu Un Irudhayaththaith Thetrikkol Endraan; Appadiye Andhineramattum Thaamadhiththirundhu, Iruvarum Pojanampanninaargal.

9 pinbu Avanum, Avan Marumanaiyaattiyum, Avan Velaikkaaranum Pogiradharku Ezhundhirundhapodhu, Sthreeyin Thagappanaagiya Avanudaiya Maaman: Idho, Pozhudhu Asthamikkappogiradhu, Saayankaalamumaayitru; Inge Raaththirikku Irungal; Paar, Maalaimayangugira Velaiyaayitru: Un Irudhayam Sandhoshamaayirukkumpadi, Inge Raaththangi Naalai Iruttode Ezhundhirundhu, Un Veettukkup Pogalaam Endraan.

10 andha Manushano, Raaththirikku Irukka Manadhillaamal, Irandu Kazhudhaigal Melum Senamvaiththu, Than Marumanaiyaattiyaik Koottikkondu, Ezhundhu Purappattu, Erusalemaagiya Eboosukku Neraaga Vandhaan.
11 avargal Eboosukku Sameebamaai Varugaiyil, Pozhudhupogiradhaayirundhadhu; Appozhudhu Velaikkaaran Than Ejamaanai Nokki: Eboosiyar Irukkira Indhap Pattanaththirkup Poi, Ange Raaththangalaam Endraan.
12 adharku Avan Ejamaan Naam Vazhiyaivittu, Isravel Puththirarillaadha Marujaadhiyaar Irukkira Pattanaththukkup Pogappadaadhu; Appaale Kibiyaa Mattum Povom Endru Solli,
13 than Velaikkaaranaip Paarththu: Naam Kibiyaavilaagilum Raamaavilaagilum Raaththangumpadikku, Avaigalil Oru Idaththirkup Poi Serumpadi Nadandhu Povom Vaa Endraan.
14 appadiye Appaale Nadandhuponaargal; Benyameen Naattai Serndha Kibiyaavin Kitta Varugaiyil, Sooriyan Asthamanamaayitru.

15 aagaiyaal Kibiyaavile Vandhu Raaththangumpadikku, Vazhiyaivittu Avvidaththirkup Ponaargal; Avan Pattanaththukkul Ponapodhu, Raaththangugiradharku Avargalai Veettile Serththukkolvaar Illaadhadhinaal, Veedhiyil Utkaarndhaan.
16 vayalile Velaiseydhu, Maalaiyile Thirumbugira Oru Kizhavan Vandhaan; Andha Manushanum Eppiraayeem Malaiththesaththaan, Avan Kibiyaavile Sanjarikkavandhaan; Avvidaththu Manusharo Benyameenar.
17 andhak Kizhavan Than Kangalai Ereduththup Pattanaththu Veedhiyil Andhap Prayaanakkaaran Irukkak Kandu: Enge Pogiraai, Engeyirundhu Vandhaai Endru Kettaan.

18 adharku Avan: Naangal Yoodhaavilulla Ooraagiya Pedhlegemilirundhu Vandhu, Eppiraayeem Malaiththesaththin Purangalmattum Pogirom; Naan Avvidaththaan; Yoodhaavilulla Pedhlegem Mattum Poivandhen, Naan Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkup Pogiren; Inge Ennai Veettile Etrukkolvaar Oruvarum Illai.
19 engal Kazhudhaigalukku Vaikkolum Theepanamum Undu; Enakkum Umadhu Adiyaalukkum Umadhu Adiyaanodirukkira Velaikkaaranukkum Appamum Dhraatcharasamum Undu; Ondrilum Kuraivillai Endraan.
20 appozhudhu Andhak Kizhavan: Unakku Samaadhaanam; Un Kuraivugalellaam Enmel Irukkattum; Veedhiyilemaaththiram Raaththangavendaam Endru Solli,
21 avanaith Than Veettukkul Azhaiththukkondupoi, Kazhudhaigalukkuth Theepanampottaan; Avargal Thangal Kaalgalaik Kazhuvikkondu, Pusiththuk Kudiththaargal.

22 avargal Manamagizhchchiyaayirukkira Podhu, Idho, Peliyaalin Makkalaagiya Andha Oor Manusharil Silar Andha Veettai Soozhndhukondu, Kadhavaith Thatti: Un Veettile Vandha Andha Manushanai Naangal Ariyumpadikku, Veliye Kondu Vaa Endru Veettukkaaranaagiya Andhak Kizhavanode Sonnaargal.

23 appozhudhu Veettukkaaranaagiya Andha Manushan Veliye Avargalidaththil Poi: Ippadi Seyyavendaam; En Sagodharare, Ippadippatta Pollaappai Seyyavendaam; Andha Manushan En Veettirkul Vandhirukkaiyil, Ippadikkoththa Madhikettai Seyyeergalaaga.

24 idho, Kanniyaasthreeyaagiya En Magalum, Andha Manidhanudaiya Marumanaiyaattiyum Irukkiraargal; Avargalai Ungalidaththil Veliye Konduvarugiren; Avargalai Avamaanappaduththi Ungal Paarvaikku Sariponapragaaram Avargalukku Seyyungal; Aanaalum Indha Manushanukku Appadippatta Madhikedaana Kaariyaththai Seyyavendaam Endraan.

25 andha Manushar Avan Sollaik Ketkavillai; Appozhudhu Andha Manushan Than Marumanaiyaattiyaip Pidiththu, Avargalidaththil Veliye Konduvandhuvittaan; Avargal Avalai Arindhukondu, Raamuzhudhum Vidiyunkaalamattum Avalai Lachchaiyaai Nadaththi, Kizhakku Velukkumpodhu Avalaip Pogavittaargal.
26 vidiyunkaalaththirku Munne Andha Sthree Vandhu, Velichchamaagumattum Ange Than Ejamaan Irundha Veettu Vaasarpadiyile Vizhundhukidandhaal.

27 aval Ejamaan Kaalame Ezhundhirundhu Veettin Kadhavaith Thirandhu, Than Vazhiye Pogap Purappadugirapodhu, Idho, Avan Marumanaiyaattiyaagiya Sthree Veettuvaasalukku Munbaagath Than Kaigalai Vaasarpadiyinmel Vaiththavalaaik Kidandhaal.
28 ezhundhiru Povom Endru Avan Avalode Sonnadharkup Pradhiyuththaram Pirakkavillai. Appozhudhu Andha Manushan Avalaik Kazhudhaiyinmel Pottukkondu, Prayaanappattu, Than Idaththirkup Ponaan.
29 avan Than Veettukku Vandhapodhu, Oru Kaththiyai Eduththu, Than Marumanaiyaattiyaip Pidiththu, Avalai Avaludaiya Elumbugalodunkoodap Pannirandu Thundamaakki, Isravelin Ellaigalukkellaam Anuppinaan.

30 appozhudhu Adhaik Kandavargalellaarum, Isravel Puththirar Egipthilirundhu Purappatta Naal Mudharkondu Innaalvaraikkum Idhaippoloththakaariyam Seyyappadavum Illai, Kaanappadavum Illai; Indhak Kaariyaththai Yosiththu Aalosanaipanni Seyyavendiyadhu Innadhendru Sollungal Endraargal.
